article_title: Marco Rubio’s ‘stealth’ campaign returns to SC
article_text:
In third place in state and nationally, Rubio’s campaign has been low key so far in the Palmetto State

The U.S. senator from Florida has deep ties to South Carolina — from Jim DeMint to advisers

Candidate will take part in a forum Friday hosted by S.C. Attorney General Alan Wilson

article_metadata.news-keywords: Sc, politics, marco rubio, south carolina, primary, republican, gop, jim demint, ben carson, donald trump, ted crus, jeb bush, winthrop university
article_metadata.description: On the heels of his slow but steady rise, Republican presidential hopeful Marco Rubio returns to the Midlands on Friday and to a state where he has deep ties.
article_metadata.title: Marco Rubio’s ‘stealth’ campaign returns to SC | The State
